alert.note: Alert for Minnehaha (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 20 at 10:20AM MDT until April 24 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River near Mitchell affecting Davison and Hanson Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, some agricultural land between 60th Street North and Interstate 90 begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CDT Thursday was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday evening and continue falling to 11.8 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Sioux River Sioux Falls I-9 12.0 12.2 Thu 11 am 12.1 12.1 12.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon at 115 PM CDT.
